events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position. The resume looks promising with strong experience in backend development.
The applicant was categorized under the Engineering cluster due to skills in software development and relevant keywords found in the resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to follow up with the candidate and manage the recruitment process.
The initial screening call was successfully conducted with the candidate, discussing their previous software engineering projects and technical skills.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the lead software engineer to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating solid understanding of algorithms and system design concepts.
Following the positive technical interview, an HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and the candidateâ€™s long-term goals.
